TightVNC Java Viewer version 2

July 20, 2011 — GlavSoft, LLC presents new TightVNC Java Viewer version 2.

Just like TightVNC Server version 2 for Windows, new Java Viewer is available both as free software (GNU GPL license) and commercially. Commercial license is required if you would like to use TightVNC Java Viewer or its components in your proprietary programs or scripts.

Commercial Licenses Available

A perpetual non-exclusive license to the complete source code costs $4,000.

Order it right now to make sure the price will not increase!

The license price includes one year of free support and updates. You will obtain all new features and bugfixes produced within one year at no additional cost.

The license terms are similar to those for TightVNC Server 2.0 for Windows (see more information about TightVNC Server licensing on this page).

How To Proceed with Commercial Licensing?

If you are interested in purchasing a commercial license, please contact us at the following e-mail address:

  • business@glavsoft.com

Also, we'll be happy to answer all your questions and will appreciate your constructive feedback. Just send us a message to the e-mail address above.

Thank you!
